output_list.reason: The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The freezeAccount function has an access control issue, allowing only the owner to freeze an arbitrary user's account.
The setPrices function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the price values.
The setStatus function has an access control issue, allowing only the owner to set the status values.
The deposit function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The withdraw function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The sell function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
